aka: The Report of the Daughter-in-law's Rice Flower
trans_title: The Report of the Daughter-in-law's Rice Flower
introduction: SYNOPSISSoon-hi sleeps with her childhood friend, Chang-su, and gets pregnant. Soon-hi goes to Seoul and tries to contact Chang-su but he ignores her so she gets a job under Chang-su. She feels that there is a need for a labor union so Chang-su gets flesh traffickers to kidnap her. Soon-hi is found guilty of murder when she kills one of these traffickers in the red district but is later released. Filled with the emptiness of vengeance, Soon-hi agrees to marry Myung-bo. A sewing technician tries to kill her but Soon-hi ends up killing him and runs away. Trying to get away, Soon-hi and Joo-hi end up killing Chang-su as he tries to kill Soon-hi. While passing a checkpoint, Soon-hi is ultimately shot dead by the police. Absolutely bewildered, Joo-hi stays by Soon-hi.故事她怀孕了，因为她和她最好的朋友长苏的关系，来到首尔与长沙联系，但她因为避免了工作而得到工作。感觉到工会的必要性的公司高管Jang Soo通过贩运组织消除了。他因为妓女谋杀贩运者而被处以罚款。缝纫技术人员试图杀死他，杀死他，逃离嫁给Myung Ho，以虚荣的报复和怨恨。他逃跑，杀死苏i和苏熙杀死他，通过检查站，警察射杀他，苏义终于死亡。珠海不会离开Netui的一面，心情不好。
